778.sentence: possibly the biggest advantage this player has ( if price was n't enough ) is the fact that the user can replace the battery him / herself by opening the lid and popping in the new battery .

779.sentence: since batteries do run out on everything , this will also be a big money-saver since ipods , irivers , rca , dell , all have built-in batteries that need to be replaced by a technician ( apple charges 100 bones for the battery replacement ) .

780.sentence: try before you buy if at all possible : although i am a mac addict now for over a decade and everyone i know has previously bought an ipod , the nomad zen xtra was a far better value and is just as easy to use with regards to both hardware and software interface .

804.sentence: for a price that 's still less than even the lowest level ipod i was able to get this 40gb monster , and the best part is it works as great as it was advertised to and then some .

805.sentence: the system is terrific in size and design , imo looking better than the ipods .

806.sentence: the system is terrific in size and design , imo looking better than the ipods .

807.sentence: it 's very solidly built , and has a nice dense feel to it .

808.sentence: i find all of the controls well-placed and not flimsy in the least .

809.sentence: the scroll wheel is better than the ipod 's as well , in that you do n't risk giving yourself a cramp running your thumb around in circles endlessly - just a small nudge of the finger and you 're there .

810.sentence: the screen 's large and easily read .

818.sentence: it 's easy to transfer , preview , and organize files .

819.sentence: the in-program id3 tag editing is a strong point , as well .

820.sentence: it was no problem for me to use their software .

822.sentence: please consider this much superior piece of equipment before plopping down half a grand for an ipod .
